title: Pablo Muchnik
text:
Pablo Muchnik (born 1966) is an American philosopher and Associate Professor of Philosophy at <a href="Emerson%20College">Emerson College</a>. 
He has been a president of the <a href="North%20American%20Kant%20Society">North American Kant Society</a> (2014-2017).
Muchnik is known for his works on philosophy of <a href="Immanuel%20Kant">Immanuel Kant</a>.
